Title: SWISS PENDANT WATCH | 17 JEWEL YELOW GOLD FILLED WITH CHAIN AND BOX
Description: Pedre (Swiss) 17-Jewel Yellow Gold-Filled Pendant Watch with Matching 26” Long Necklace Swiss; Pedre; Lady’s; Circa: 1960’s CASE: The yellow open face 36.1mm case has a rolled gold plate bezel with stainless back. DIAL: This gold textured metal dial displays hour markers and baton hands. MOVT: This 17-jewel stem-set movement with lever escapement is nickel with a ¾- plate layout.
